right.text: only slightly back in time though; no more than the beginning of the day.

left.text: I had the craziest dream last night: I could take over other people's bodies and could go back in time. It was so awesome.

right.text: one of them had some sort of psychic powers. she was a fucking dickgirl though, so I ditched her

left.text: it was in a little school; a high school with hot girls :)
she was hot until I took over her body for some reason and found out she had a dick
